quest.Name: King's Hope
quest.Accomplishment: You brought King one of the gauntlets that belonged to his dear friend.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= comforted King by giving him hope.

step.Name: Find the Campsite
step.text: Travel 4 parasangs east of Red Rock.

step.Name: Investigate the Campsite
step.text: Look for something to bring back to King.

step.Name: Return to King
step.text: Bring whatever you find back to King.
